query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS store_banners (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  storeId INT NOT NULL,
  imageUrl TEXT NOT NULL,
  linkUrl TEXT,
  title VARCHAR(255),
  `order` INT DEFAULT 0,
  isActive INT DEFAULT 1,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway04.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3mZv6GBgcMQKXyT.root --database jdJmiUPhANN27bg8N7Grdt --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS store_banners (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  storeId INT NOT NULL,
  imageUrl TEXT NOT NULL,
  linkUrl TEXT,
  title VARCHAR(255),
  `order` INT DEFAULT 0,
  isActive INT DEFAULT 1,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);
